mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.xsxh AS "xsxh", a.sfsf as "sfsf", a.sfzz AS "sfzz", a.sfdlxy AS "sfdlxy", a.jyqdbz AS "jyqdbz", a.zgdwdm AS "zgdwdm", a.zgdwmc AS "zgdwmc", a.yrdwlsmc AS "yrdwlsmc", a.bddddm AS "bddddm", a.xjcqk AS "xjcqk", a.dwszddm as "dwszddm", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_jypuchong( owid, yh_Ref_Owid, xsxh, sfsf, sfzz, sfdlxy, jyqdbz, zgdwdm, zgdwmc, yrdwlsmc, bddddm, xjcqk, dwszddm, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{xsxh}, #{sfsf}, #{sfzz}, #{sfdlxy}, #{jyqdbz}, #{zgdwdm}, #{zgdwmc}, #{yrdwlsmc}, #{bddddm}, #{xjcqk}, #{dwszddm}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_jypuchong SET owid = #{owid}, yh_Ref_Owid=#{yhRefOwid}, xsxh = #{xsxh}, sfsf=#{sfsf}, sfzz = #{sfzz}, sfdlxy = #{sfdlxy}, jyqdbz = #{jyqdbz}, zgdwdm = #{zgdwdm}, zgdwmc = #{zgdwmc}, yrdwlsmc = #{yrdwlsmc}, bddddm = #{bddddm}, xjcqk = #{xjcqk}, dwszddm=#{dwszddm}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}

UPDATE bckj_biz_jypuchong SET sfsf=#{sfsf}, sfzz = #{sfzz}, xsxh=#{xsxh}, sfdlxy=#{sfdlxy}, jyqdbz=#{jyqdbz}, zgdwdm=#{zgdwdm}, zgdwmc=#{zgdwmc}, yrdwlsmc=#{yrdwlsmc}, dwszddm=#{dwszddm}, xjcqk=#{xjcqk} WHERE yh_ref_owid = #{yhRefOwid}
